features: 𝗡𝗔𝗨𝗧𝗜𝗖𝗔 𝗥𝗨𝗚 𝗖𝗢𝗟𝗟𝗘𝗖𝗧𝗜𝗢𝗡 – Step into comfort with the new Nautica Puffy Shag Rugs Collection. Made using soft and durable yarns, these luxurious rugs are designed to last
𝗠𝗢𝗗𝗘𝗥𝗡 𝗛𝗢𝗠𝗘 𝗗𝗘𝗖𝗢𝗥 – Revamp and refresh your living room, bedroom or kitchen décor. Featuring a non-piling and lint free finish, these are the perfect addition to any room

𝐈𝐍𝐕𝐈𝐓𝐈𝐍𝐆 𝐂𝐎𝐋𝐎𝐑𝐒 & 𝐒𝐓𝐘𝐋𝐄𝐒 – Available in elegant White, Navy, Dark Gray and Light Gray tones. Pair with similar tones and patterns for a cohesive look or style with different colors and textures for an eclectic modern feel
𝗧𝗛𝗘 𝗣𝗘𝗥𝗙𝗘𝗖𝗧 𝗦𝗜𝗭𝗘 – Available in multiple sizes including, runner rugs, accent rugs and area rugs. Nautica’s Puffy Shag Rug Collection will compliment any room in your home
𝗖𝗔𝗥𝗘 𝗜𝗡𝗦𝗧𝗥𝗨𝗖𝗧𝗜𝗢𝗡𝗦 – Nautica Puffy Rugs should be vacuumed regularly. Spot clean using a mild detergent solution or clean professionally. A rug pad or carpet pad is recommended (sold separately)
body.description: Step into comfort with the Nautica Puffy Rugs Shag Collection. Elegant, inviting colors and soft durable yarns will compliment any family room, bedroom/guest room or living room with a non-piling lint-free finish. This Puffy Rugs Shag collection is available in Gray/Navy, Gray/White, White/Dark Gray, and Light Gray/White. Pair with similar tones and patterns for a cohesive look or style with different colors and textures for an eclectic modern feel. Includes: (1) 20 in. x 60 in. Runner Rug. Shag rug measures 1.57 inches in pile height. A non-slip rug pad (not included) is recommended to prevent slippage. Pile: 100% Polypropylene. High quality shag fibers require dry cleaning. Woven in Turkey

productInformation.name: Product Care Instructions
productInformation.value: ‎Rug should be spot cleaned with a solution of mild detergent and water or cleaned professionally. Vacuum regularly. Rug Pad is recommended.

productInformation.value: ‎Bedroom, Living Room, Dining Room, Kitchen, Kids, Nursery, Bathroom, Home Office

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 5, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful & So Soft! I love it!
reviews.reviewText: I love my new rug! I haven't been happy with a rug style & color in a very long time. This one is perfect for our house. I really wasn't expecting it to be so soft and fluffy! It's also big and beautiful! I love the design and the grey is the perfect shade. It could match anything. It really pulls my room together.Our floors are hard and my toddler hates being on them. He actually played and laid on this rug all day. I think he likes it just as much as me. It seems to be well made too. I added padding underneath mine for extra cushioning but it's not necessary. The corners laid flat fast. I set a book on them and they were fine after a couple hours.My rug did come half unwrapped and it was dirty on the side that was wrapped. I won't remove a star though because I do love the rug and the dirt came off with my scrubber.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 15, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not good quality
reviews.reviewText: Several areas are flattened out and looks horrible

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 12, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Incredibly soft & plush!!
reviews.reviewText: I will start by saying that "cozy" items like rugs ,throws, pillows etc. are my weakness and I have an abundance of all! With that being said, this Nautica rug looks and feels like it was made for me! It is made with exceptional quality, thick and incredible soft. So luxurious and plush. Our pups love to just lay on it all day and I don't blame them! The print is beautiful and looks just like the listing photos. It vacuums easily and doesn't appear to shed. We have not had to clean it yet aside of vacuuming, so I will update as needed!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 17, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Like all the reviews show, it is lush! A beautiful statement piece in my front room.The white and black style is a bright white, and the dark details look even better than pictured.The material is fluffy, with the bounce back of a cotton ball. Feels great to sit/walk/lay on.It is a bit lumpy for the first week while the backer straightens out.This is not a high quality twisted poly like you would find in a carpet-limiting the life of this rug. This is my second one, the first was in a high traffic area and lost thickness and changed texture.I place this in a low traffic area of my home to enjoy it longer. Hope this is helpful!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 21, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on April 1, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I just want to roll around on it!
reviews.reviewText: I love this rug!! I love the design and the colors and the look and feel....I love everything about it! The size is perfect and it's beautifully made! It is incredibly fluffy and so soft... I look at it and all I want to do is lay down and roll around on it! I finally did the other day when I was putting together some furniture, it was just as wonderful as I thought it would be!! It's heaven to walk on and look at. I've found its easy to spot clean too. I am so pleased and I absolutely recommend this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 14, 2022
reviews.reviewText: This is an awesome rug for the price! I put it under my bed to make the room more cozy and it's perfect. It looks exactly as pictured as well. It's very soft and it's great neutral rug that can go with pretty much anything. I am not sure it's a rug that you could use a carpet cleaner with so be advised if you have pets or kids (spot cleaning only). Overall, if you like the style of the rug that you will love it! I hope this was helpful! Have a beautiful day! :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 13, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very pretty, soft, fluffy
reviews.reviewText: Really like this rug! It’s soft, fluffy and seems to be durable and good quality! The only issue is some bleeding of colors I’m spots and there was some pinkish or reddish blotch on one area as pictured. Not a big deal for me as it was going partially under the bed and wouldn’t be seen. Not too noticeable even if it wasn’t hidden. Recommend!
